channel.title: Donor signs in chat
channel.description:
okay well first off... i do REALIZE that is client sided. But adding a crown isn't my issue.
So on my server your able to get donor, get the donor modicon to go with it. NORMALLY the donor sign works just fine. However, for some weird reason the donor sign does not want to work on this specific person. At first I thought it was because maybe there was so many spaces in that persons name but after some tests were done that was not the case.
I am pretty stumped as to WHY the sign would show up for everyone else but not for this particular person.
His name is : i rep 480

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

His name temporarely was changed to test if it was spaces. That didn’t even fix it. The crown just literally doesn’t show up for this one user at all. Weird.

okay well first off… i do REALIZE that is client sided. But adding a crown isn’t my issue.

So on my server your able to get donor, get the donor modicon to go with it. NORMALLY the donor sign works just fine.
